  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:aspect:eri/10001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>aspect:eri/10001</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Informacijska tehnologija</string>
            <string language="en">Information Technology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationstechnologie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Technologie de l'Information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tecnologia De Informação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tecnologia dell'informazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνολογία πληροφοριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tecnología De Información</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o informacijski tehnologiji v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: pregled zgodovine računalnika, osnovni pojmi pri računalniku (operacijski sistem, vhodno izhodne naprave, programska in strojna oprema).</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about information technology, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: history of computing, basic concepts (operation system, input/output devices, hardware, software).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">računalnik</string>
            <string language="en">computer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">strojna oprema</string>
            <string language="en">hardware</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">programska oprema</string>
            <string language="en">software</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">operacijski sistem</string>
            <string language="en">operating system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">von neumannov model</string>
            <string language="en">von neumann architecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über Informationstechnologie, Teil 
Ematerialien für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt: 
Geschichte des Rechnens, Grundmodelle (Operation System, 
Input/Output Einheiten, Hardware, Software).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet de technologie de 
l'information, partie d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et 
informatique. Contenu de chapitre : histoire du calcul, 
concepts de base (système d'exécution, dispositifs d'entrée-sortie,
matériel, logiciel).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre a tecnologia de informação, 
parte dos e-materiais para a informática de e informatics. 
Índices do capítulo: history de computar, conceitos 
básicos (sistema da operação, dispositivos do input/output, 
ferragem, software).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa tecnologia dell'informazione 
facente parte i e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. 
Soddisfare di capitolo: storia di computazione, concetti 
di base (sistema di esercizio, dispositivi dell'ingreso/uscita, 
hardware, software).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για την τεχνολογία πληροφοριών, μέρος των 
ε-υλικών για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. 
Περιεχόμενο κεφαλαίου: ιστορία του υπολογισμού, 
βασικές έννοιες (σύστημα λειτουργίας, είσοδος/συσκευές εξόδου, 
υλικό, λογισμικό).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre tecnología de información, 
parte de los e-materiales para la informática e informática. 
Contenido del capítulo: historia de computar, conceptos 
básicos (sistema de la operación, dispositivos de la entrada-salida,
dotación física, software).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Computer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hardware</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Software</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebssystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">von Neumann Architektur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">logiciel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système d'exploitation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">architecture de neumann de von</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">computador</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
